name: Fear of Flying
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), David Sacks, Richard Appel (staff writer), Jennifer Crittenden (staff writer)
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: Marge goes into therapy to cure her of her traumatizing fear of flying.
